testCase.name: getCharacters should return the list of characters
getCharacterById should return the correct character when a valid ID is provided
getCharacterById should throw an error when an invalid ID is provided
CharacterDetailPage Component renders "loading..." when character data is not loaded
CharacterDetailPage Component renders CharacterDetail component when character data is loaded
renders "There is no character" when characters array is empty
renders the correct number of characters when characters array is not empty
renders "There is no character" when no characters are provided
CharactersList Component renders correctly with non-empty characters array
CharactersList Component generates correct links for each character
AboutPage Component sets document title correctly
ContactPage Component sets document title correctly
ContactPage Component renders contact email link correctly
CharacterDetail Component renders correctly with an empty character object
CharacterDetail Component renders character details correctly
CharacterDetail Component renders image correctly when thumbnail is provided
